paper_abstract: After a short discussion about similarities and dissimilarities of membrane computing and brane calculi, insisting mainly on some recent ideas of bridging the two areas of research, one recalls some details concerning certain classes of P systems based on brane calculi operations. Several open problems are formulated in this context. (C) 2008 Elsevier B.V. All rights reserved.
paper_title: Membrane computing and brane calculi. Old, new, and future bridges
